title: JSON Schema for UnitTestEx HTTP request/response mocking (https://github.com/Avanade/unittestex).

method.title: The HTTP Request Method; defaults to 'GET'.

uri.title: The HTTP Request URI (path and query).

media.title: The HTTP Request Body (content) media type.
media.description: Defaults to 'application/json' where the Body contains JSON; otherwise, 'text/plain'.

ignore.title: The HTTP Request Body JSON paths to ignore from the comparison.
ignore.description: This is only applied where the 'media' is 'application/json'.

sequence.title: The mocked HTTP responses array (sequence) configuration.

status.title: The HTTP Response status code.
status.description: Defaults to 200-OK where there is a corresponding Body; otherwise, 204-No content.

media.title: The HTTP Request Body (content) media type.
media.description: Defaults to 'application/json' where the Body contains JSON; otherwise, 'text/plain'.
